data.title: Johnathan Bond on LinkedIn: Im on set at WGGS Television in Taylors SC, ready to share some of the…
data.meta_description:
Im on set at WGGS Television in Taylors SC, ready to share some of the songs on my brand new CD, Pure Inspiration.  

#JohnathanBond
#PureInspiration
data.text:
BRAND NEW RADIO SINGLE!!! What happens when a guy from Nigeria and a guy from Tennessee began to talk? Within just a few minutes, they both realize that the GOD who brought me through the car crash, and the GOD who delivered him is exactly the same GOD! He’s GOD all over the universe and that is what this song will remind the listeners!! SAME GOD Elder Dempster/Johnathan Bond Writers : Johnathan Bond/Elder Dempster Publisher: HIS Choice Music/BMI Producer: Michael Lee CLICK LINK BELOW TO LISTEN ————————————————— https://lnkd.in/ebTtd66t ————————————————— #Tennessee #wsmradio #SameGod #Elderdempster #Gracerecordsnashvillellc #Debbiebennett #JohnathanBond #Myhelp

LEBANON TENNESSEE TONIGHT!!! WOW!! This is going to be a tremendous evening! WSM Radio is here setting up to get things kicked off. I just happen to have two extra tickets for tonight. If you would like to register for a free ticket, name, one of my songs in the comment section below. I will give the tickets away at 6 PM tonight! It’s definitely an evening you don’t want to miss. I will tell you that American Idol is being represented here tonight in a really cool way and on the same stage that I am on. REGISTER BY COMMENTING BELOW!! Thursday, August 15, 2024 7:30 Tennessee State Fair Fiddler's Grove stage 945 East Baddour Parkway Lebanon, TN Fairgrounds #JohnathanBond #Tennessee #wsmradio

THANK YOU JESUS!! Today, Michelle, Tina, Bryan and myself handed out 246 $10 food cards to homeless and underprivileged people here in Nashville!! Most showed gratitude, but one man specifically, Jamal, said, “you guys are a bright light in a dark world and I’m sure that God is pleased with you”. OH MY!! Isn’t that what we’re supposed to be doing? Being a beacon of hope in a world that is crashing around us? To everyone who helps with Extended Arms, whether it be prayerfully, physically, or financially, THANK YOU!! Together, we truly are making a difference! ❤️ VENMO: @Johnathan-Bond-1 PAYPAL: https://lnkd.in/d-qm3Q2 CASH APP: $YoungHarmony Zelle: 423.280.0547 PO Box 2584 Chattanooga TN 37409 #JohnathanBond #ExtendedArmsProject

TENNESSEE, OHIO, & KENTUCKY!! So excited about this upcoming weekend! You just never know who will be with me at these worship services!! Will you come join us? If you are unable to attend, please add me in my travels to your prayers. Thank you so much!! NIOTA TENNESSEE Friday, August 16 5:00 PM to 8:00 PM Niota Depot 11 W. Main St HAMILTON OHIO Saturday, August 17 7:00 PM COMMUNITY WIDE CONCERT Harvest Christian Fellowship. 1245 Ross Ave SOMERSET KENTUCKY Sunday, August 18 11:00 AM Cornerstone Baptist 512 Ogden St EDMONTON KENTUCKY Sunday August 18 5:30 PM Grace Union Baptist Church 3611 Subtle Road MANSFIELD KENTUCKY Monday, August 19 12:00 PM Extended Arms Feeding the Homeless #JohnathanBond #itsnotover
